verses.text: Why glory \w in|strong="H1732"\w* mischief, you hero? God’s kindness \w is|strong="H1732"\w* all \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day.

Engulfing ruin \w you|strong="H5046"\w* plot, \w your|strong="H5046"\w* tongue \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* razor sharpened, \w you|strong="H5046"\w* practiser \w of|strong="H1004"\w* deceit.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w not|strong="H7451"\w* \w good|strong="H2617"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* falsehood, \w not|strong="H7451"\w* words \w of|strong="H3117"\w* truth. \qs Selah\qs*

But \w you|strong="H6213"\w* love \w all|strong="H6213"\w* words \w that|strong="H3956"\w* devour, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w that|strong="H3956"\w* \w is|strong="H3956"\w* \w given|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w deceit|strong="H7423"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* God, \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* part, \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* destroy \w you|strong="H1696"\w* forever, grasp \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* pluck \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H1696"\w* tent, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* root \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* living. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

Smitten \w with|strong="H1697"\w* awe \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sight, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* laugh \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

“Look” (\w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* say) “\w at|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* hero \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w did|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* make God \w his|strong="H5422"\w* stronghold, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* great wealth \w and|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w strength|strong="H5331"\w* \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* riches.”

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fresh olive-tree \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kindness \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7200"\w* evermore.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w render|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* thanks \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* what \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w*. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w how|strong="H2009"\w* good \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w are|strong="H1397"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* presence \w of|strong="H7230"\w* those \w who|strong="H1397"\w* love \w you|strong="H7760"\w*.
